Package packlightbulb

Class LightBulb

java.lang.Object
packlightbulb.LightBulb
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<LightBulb>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Adjustable, Fluorescent
public class LightBulb
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<LightBulb>
Represents a light bulb in general.
Version:
1
Author:
Oihan Irastorza

  • Constructor Details

    • LightBulb

      public LightBulb​(java.lang.String ID, double watts, double lumens)
      LightBulb class constructor. Initializes ID, watts and lumen, and on attributes.
      Parameters:
      ID - light bulb identifier
      watts - light bulb rated power (W)
      lumens - light bulb maximum brightness (Lm)

    • isOn

      public boolean isOn()
      Getter for on attribute
      Returns:

    • turnOn

      public void turnOn() throws AlreadyOnException
      Turns on the light bulb.
      Throws:
      AlreadyOnException - if the light bulb is already on

    • turnOff

      public void turnOff() throws AlreadyOffException
      Turns off the light bulb.
      Throws:
      AlreadyOffException - if the light bulb is already off

    • efficacy

      public double efficacy()
      Returns the efficacy of the light bulb, which is calculated by dividing the luminosity by the rated power.
      Returns:
      light bulb efficacy
